code: import React from"react";import{dp}from"../../assets";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{toggleSidebar}from"../../features/modalSlice";import"./online.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Online=()=>{const{users:{usersOnline,users}}=useSelector(state=>state);const dispatch=useDispatch();const allUsers=()=>{return users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/user/".concat(user._id),onClick:()=>dispatch(toggleSidebar(false)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user.profileImage||dp,loading:"lazy",alt:user.name+" image",className:"roundimage"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:user.name})]})},user._id));};const onlineUsers=()=>{const _usersOnline=users.filter(user=>usersOnline.some(u=>u.id===user._id));return _usersOnline.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/user/".concat(user._id),onClick:()=>dispatch(toggleSidebar(false)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user",title:user.name,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"green",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user.profileImage||dp,alt:user.name+" image",className:"roundimage"})})})},user._id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"online",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Users Online - ",usersOnline.length]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"online-users",children:onlineUsers()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["All Users - ",users.length]}),allUsers()]});};export default Online;
